resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4315</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using an Old Newspaper</string>
            <string language="es">Utilización de un periódico viejo</string>
            <string language="ga">Sean-nuachtán a Úsáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden einer alten Zeitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation d'un vieux journal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando um jornal velho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando un vecchio giornale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση μιας παλαιάς εφημερίδας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Ideas for using old newspapers in the study of the recent past. Such resources give children the opportunity to engage in practical research.</string>
            <string language="es">Ideas para utilizar periódicos viejos en el estudio del pasado reciente. Dichos recursos dan a la los niños la oportunidad de implicarse en la investigación práctica.</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaointe maidir le sean-nuachtáin a úsáid chun staidéar a dhéanamh ar stair úrnua. Tugann na hacmhainní seo deis do dhaltaí bheith páirteach i dtaighde phraiticiúil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia SESE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ideen für das Verwenden der alten Zeitungen in 
der Studie der neuen Vergangenheit. Solche Betriebsmittel geben 
Kindern die Gelegenheit, sich in der praktischen Forschung zu 
engagieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Idées pour l'usage de vieux journaux dans 
l'étude du passé récent. De telles ressources donnent à des 
enfants l'occasion de s'engager dans la recherche pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idéias para usar jornais velhos no estudo do 
passado recente. Tais recursos dão a crianças a oportunidade 
de acoplar na pesquisa prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idee per usando i vecchi giornali nello studio 
sull'esperienza recente. Tali risorse danno a bambini 
l'occasione agganciarsi nella ricerca pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιδέες για τη χρησιμοποίηση των παλαιών εφημερίδων στη 
μελέτη του πρόσφατου παρελθόντος. Τέτοια στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς δίνουν στα παιδιά την ευκαιρία να συμμετέχουν στην 
πρακτική έρευνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
